home.title: Track Your Work.
home.sen2: Don't trust your boss with keeping track of your work hours?
home.sen3: Trying to remember what you worked on last week?
home.sen4: You are in the right place.
home.card1text: Whether you're paid hourly or globally, you can add it all up.
home.card2text: If you work as a freelancer or have more than 1 work place - it's not a problem.
home.card3text: staying on top of your tasks made easy.

dashboard.add: Add a Work Place In Order To Start Tracking :)
